sentence.Network_en: Chromite and / or magnesite mineralization is usually related to the ophiolites.
sentence.Network_cn: 铬铁矿及(或)菱镁矿化通常是与蛇绿岩有关.

sentence.Network_en: The magnesite originated from the peridotite by weathering.
sentence.Network_cn: 菱镁矿是由橄榄岩风化形成的.

sentence.Network_en: Magnesite deposits account for approximately 80 % of total magnesia production.
sentence.Network_cn: 大约80%的氧化镁产量来自菱镁矿.
